name: Flokkers
description:
Command your tribe of Flokkers and become their savior! Guide these helpless creatures through dangerous landscapes by assigning them tasks and shaping their path.

Flokkers is a 2D action puzzler where you have to control multiple creatures at once.
- more than 80 levels with increasing difficulty
- various landscapes with dynamic weather effects
- 12 unique abilities for your Flokkers

Shape the environment and guide your Flokkers to safety by assigning tasks and abilities in the right place at the right time. The number of abilities for each level is limited, so make the most of it!

They need your help, so what are you waiting for?
